description: This Java class defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application, providing custom responses for specific exceptions such as resource not found, validation errors, and generic exceptions.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A controller advice class that handles various exceptions globally within the Spring Boot application, generating problem detail responses.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles ResourceNotFoundException by returning a ProblemDetail with a 404 status.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles MethodArgumentNotValidException by returning a ProblemDetail with validation errors.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Catches all other exceptions and returns a generic server error response.
